What you get

üé®

True colour fidelity

Each cell captures the exact RGB value of your original image. No compression, no approximation.

‚ö°

Blazing fast

Optimised with fill caching to handle images with thousands of unique colours without breaking a sweat.

üîÑ

Round-trip ready

Convert images to Excel and back again. Includes QA tools to verify pixel-perfect reconstruction.

üõ†Ô∏è

CLI & Python API

Use from the command line or import into your own Python projects. Properly packaged for pip install.

üìä

Generates proper .xlsx files that open in Excel, Google Sheets, LibreOffice ‚Äî anywhere spreadsheets live.

How it works

1

Pick an image

Any photo, screenshot, or meme. PNG, JPG, whatever you've got.

2

Run the command

image2xlsx photo.png ‚Äî that's it. One command.

3

Open in Excel

Zoom out, hide the gridlines, and behold your spreadsheet masterpiece.

Ready to make some art?

Install with pip and start converting in seconds.

# Install from PyPI
pip install excel-pixel-art

# Convert an image
image2xlsx your-photo.png

# Convert back (for fun)
xlsx2image your-photo_excel.xlsx
